name: upbeat
content:

full of hope and happiness: A number of companies remain upbeat about growth prospects in the coming months. Live music and a parade set an upbeat mood for the official opening. Given the criticism he has taken, he remains remarkably upbeat. The book ends on an upbeat note. Synonym
cheerful
Upbeat music is fast and often sounds happy: This is a catchy, upbeat dance track. Research shows that listening to an upbeat tempo will improve your mood.
